column4: can somebody help me? I want to get rit of the error (E: dpkg was interrupted). I cant install or update my system because this error always apears
does it say to try running "apt-get -f install"?
i'd tell you to try doing what it suggests, but the "E: _cache->open() failed, please report." part sounds bad. one moment please
